response.original_title: The Biggest Tailgate Party in Mississippi
response.overview: Real Estate Developer Blake Tartt III, a graduate of the University of Mississippi, decides to throw a party to show his Texas business partners how tailgating is done at The Grove.  The event becomes a recreation of his college days, with an escalating guest list, until it is the largest tailgate party in Mississippi.
response.title: The Biggest Tailgate Party in Mississippi
